define.name: context_map_base_size
define.doc: Number of bits in binary representation of base context which is added to SID to get the 'global SID'. Log2 of 'context_map_base_nof'

define.name: sid_min_size
define.doc: Minimal number of bits in binary representation of Stream ID.

define.name: sid_size
define.doc: Number of bits in binary representation of Stream ID. Log2 of 'nof_stream_ids'

define.name: nof_stream_ids
define.doc: Maximal Number of Stream IDs. Note that we include here the stream IDs which are below the 'min'

define.name: global_sid_offset_size
define.doc: Number of bits in binary representation of GLOBAL SID offset. Log2 of 'global_sid_offset_nof'

define.name: global_sid_offset_nof
define.doc: Number of GLOBAL SID offsets. Maximal value of GLOBAL SID offset plus 1

define.name: sid_offset_size
define.doc: Number of bits in binary representation of SID offset, in bytes. Log2 of 'sid_offset_nof'

define.name: sid_offset_nof
define.doc: Number of SID offsets when counted in bytes. Maximal value of SID offset plus 1

define.name: sid_offset_nof_in_bits
define.doc: Number of SID offsets when counted in bits. Maximal value of SID offset in bits plus 1

define.name: context_size
define.doc: Context ID size, in bits. Log2 of 'nof_contexts'

define.name: pkt_size_lower_limit
define.doc: Minimum packet size for Bypass Mode

define.name: pkt_size_upper_limit
define.doc: Maximum packet size for Bypass Mode

define.name: link_mask_size
define.doc: Size direct link mask for bypass traffic

define.name: link_mask_nof
define.doc: Number of direct link masks for bypass traffic

numeric.name: mode
numeric.doc: TDM mode - defines header type. If NONE - tdm disabled
